thread.title: Dog And His Friend Abandoned In Industrial Area Only Want to Be Loved
thread.title_full: Dog And His Friend Abandoned In Industrial Area Only Want to Be Loved

author: Reshareworthy Editorial Team
title: Dog And His Friend Abandoned In Industrial Area Only Want to Be Loved
text:
Dog And His Friend Abandoned In Industrial Area Only Want to Be Loved   
These two special dogs only wanted to be loved, but someone didn’t care and dumped them in an industrial area to fend for themselves. Hope For Paws came to save them, and learned that Boots and Babs had been living on the streets for more than a year. 
However, their hard times hadn’t made them scared or angry. In fact, the dogs were so friendly and goofy and happy, it made their rescuers smile. Now Boots and Babs are looking for a home and someone to love!
